item.title: Alexa
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Recipezaar broke the 10,000 barrier on Alexa! We're now at 9,610. This means that if you ranked all the web sites in popularity, we're the 9,610th most popular site. Not bad for a couple geeks banging away on computers above their garage, and considering that there are zillions of sites on the web. :) Of course, this is just one web ranking system and no ranking system is perfectly accurate, so it must be taken with a pinch of salt. But it's as good a metric as any. I also love that we have a great 5-star review rating on Alexa, more total reviews and more 5-stars than any of our competitors.
